DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study track clinical safety effectiveness Pericardium Covered Stent `` real world '' use .
DOC.brief_title: Over Under/Aneugraft Pericardium Covered Stent Long Term Follow Registry
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center registry 75 patient treat Over Under/Aneugraft Pericardium Covered Stent ( PCS ) ( IGTI , Israel ) . The registry involve collection demographic , clinical , angiographic data treat patient population , include in-hospital , 30 day , 6-month , 1 year , 2 year 3 year clinical follow-up data .
DOC.criteria: Patient old 18 year Patient must available followup Patient must fully inform , provide patient information sheet sign Informed Consent Form prior procedure . The lesion treat suitable treatment PCS : A . A suitable length diameter PCS available B . For SVG disease single multiple PCS may use C. For native coronary artery aneurysm operator confident aneurysm may exclude implantation single PCS Significant comorbidity preclude clinical followup . Pregnancy ; pregnancy test negative woman child bear potential Acute STelevation myocardial infarction within precede 48 hour Previous stent implantation target vessel Left main coronary artery disease Contraindication dual antiplatelet therapy . Planned surgery lead discontinuation antiplatelet therapy Thrombocytopenia ( < 100,000/mm3 ) Ejection fraction < 30 % . Renal failure ( creatinine > 180 Âµmol/L [ 2 mg/dL ] ) Prior brachytherapy Recipient heart transplant Acute infection
